affiliation: Research Engineer, Children's Hospital Los Angeles
name: David Kale
biography: Dave is a research engineer in the Virtual Pediatric Intensive Care Unit (VPICU) group at Children’s Hospital Los Angeles, where he is brings to bear his background in computer science and artificial intelligence to develop next-generation clinical decision support systems that are data-driven, patient-centered, and personalized. He recently became a contributor to JPL’s Object Oriented Data Technology (OODT) as a part of the Apache Incubator.
